rules.title: FTP service exposed (unencrypted)
rules.description: FTP transmits credentials in plaintext. Consider disabling or using SFTP/FTPS.

rules.title: Possible outdated SSH service
rules.description: SSH service may be running an older OpenSSH version. Consider upgrading to a supported version.

rules.title: SMBv1 service exposed (EternalBlue risk)
rules.description: SMBv1 is enabled. Systems exposing SMBv1 may be vulnerable to EternalBlue and related exploits.

rules.title: HTTP exposed without HTTPS
rules.description: HTTP is exposed. If HTTPS (443) is not available on this host, consider enabling TLS to protect traffic.
